home.heroSubtitle: Lariboisière Hospital – Assistance Publique – Hôpitaux de Paris (AP-HP)
home.chief: Head of Department: Professor Patrick HENRY
home.olvaDescription: Developing a portable and reusable platform for cardiac ablation — making electrophysiology more accessible and sustainable.
home.partnersTitle: MIRACL.ai is founded by <highlight>7 French centers</highlight> of excellence
home.partnersInstructions: Click a center to meet its teams and discover their projects at MIRACL.ai.

news.sectionSubtitle: Insights, partnerships, and breakthroughs from the MIRACL.ai community.

card1.title: AI-assisted quantification of cardiac fibrosis
card1.excerpt: Our imaging scientists unveil an automated pipeline that accelerates fibrosis quantification across multi-center clinical trials.

card2.title: New collaboration with AP-HP data hub
card2.excerpt: We join forces with AP-HP's data hub to co-design interoperable imaging datasets ready for large-scale AI validation.

card3.title: First patients enrolled in MIRACL-Flow study
card3.excerpt: The prospective MIRACL-Flow study officially kicked off with its first cohort, focusing on longitudinal cardiovascular imaging markers.

card4.title: Launching the MIRACL developer sandbox
card4.excerpt: A secure cloud sandbox now lets partners prototype cardiovascular AI algorithms with curated datasets and governance built in.
card4.imageAlt: Abstract illustration of connected heart data

hero.title: Collective excellence for cardiovascular innovation
hero.backgroundAlt: The MIRACL team gathered during an event
hero.introLead: MIRACL.ai brings together a consortium of hospitals where radiologists, cardiologists, and engineers combine their expertise.

teamPage.partnersInstructions:
MIRACL.ai brings together a consortium of hospital centers where radiologists, cardiologists, and engineers combine their expertise.
Click a center to meet its teams and discover their projects at MIRACL.ai.

missions.title: Our missions
missions.description: We build an open ecosystem where clinical research and industrial innovation strengthen each other.

ecosystem.title: Unite the ecosystem
ecosystem.description: Bring innovation stakeholders together by creating bridges around shared priorities.

support.title: Support projects
support.description: Guide every stakeholder from study design to execution and scale-up.

collaborate.title: Boost collaboration
collaborate.description: Encourage closer cooperation between players across the Greater Paris area.

inclusion.title: Champion inclusion
inclusion.description: Promote inclusion, diversity and environmentally responsible tech.

team.title: Our team
team.description: A multidisciplinary crew combining medical expertise, data science and complex program delivery.

patrickHenry.name: Prof. Patrick Henry
patrickHenry.bio: Interventional cardiologist ensuring clinical pathways and scientific rigor for our core lab readings.

claireDubois.name: Dr Claire Dubois
claireDubois.bio: Radiologist specialized in cardiac MRI, structuring research protocols and annotation methodologies.

alexandreMoreau.name: Alexandre Moreau
alexandreMoreau.bio: Machine learning engineer leading data pipelines, industrialization and model transfer.

board.title: Our board
board.description: A strategic committee of academic and institutional leaders steering our roadmap.

sophieMartin.name: Sophie Martin
sophieMartin.bio: Digital health entrepreneur safeguarding MIRACL.ai's vision and governance.

drissBenali.name: Dr Driss Benali
drissBenali.bio: Innovation lead within AP-HP facilitating orchestration with partner hospitals.

heleneGomez.name: Hélène Gomez
heleneGomez.bio: Specialist in software medical devices securing compliance and value strategy.

research.strapline: The infrastructure behind collaborative cardiovascular imaging research.
research.description: MIRACL.ai connects cardiologists, radiologists, engineers, and data scientists to advance cardiovascular research. We provide centralized imaging services, tailored AI solutions, and scientific support to accelerate impactful studies.

card1.title: Centralized multimodal analysis
card1.description: Expert review across every cardiovascular imaging modality (MRI, CT, ultrasound, ECG, angiography). Achieve the robustness and reliability your clinical trials and publications require.

card2.title: End-to-end project support
card2.description: From study design to secure data collection, we guide every stage of your projects. Our specialists ensure methodology, quality control, and regulatory compliance.

card3.title: Data for AI innovation
card3.description: Access expertly annotated multimodal registries. Validate algorithms and create new biomarkers with unique multi-center, multi-pathology cohorts.

auth.name: Name
auth.nameMinLength: Name must be at least 2 characters
auth.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 6 characters
